summary: Provides a structured container that holds batches of hypothesis data—such as label sequences, corresponding time indices, and confidence scores—used during RNNT (Recurrent Neural Network Transducer) decoding, handling allocation, insertion, and reset of the stored information.
business_intent: Accelerate and simplify large‑scale speech‑recognition decoding by managing hypothesis batches efficiently, reducing memory overhead and runtime for RNNT models.
